page.title: 13A HOLIDAY FROM DANE END AREA
page.content: {MY HOLIDAY BY SALLY:}On {SATURDAY I} didn't go anywhere but on Sunday I went to see Grandma who lives in Southgate, London. We had a lovely lunch of roast beef, yorkshire pudding and we finished with a trifle. In the afternoon we went for a walk in the park and came home at 9pm. MONDAY: I did not go out. TUESDAY: I went to Ferique's house. She has a pony called Shilling. He is a bay and we did jumps on him. WEDNESDAY: We went swimming with some friends and I did some dives. THURSDAY: In the afternoon I went riding and rode a pony called Surprise. FRIDAY: I stayed at home. SATURDAY: I went to Ware Carnival and saw Tessa Sanderson. Nicki Slater and Karen Barber. On Saturday night I went to Ware Fair with my family. I won three balloons and Tim, my brother, won a goldfish and it is still alive!
